text: Ɛna Mad’yan nso wͻn nua Shua’ib kͻͻ wͻn hͻ. Ɔkaa sε: “Menkorͻfoͻ, monsom Nyankopͻn, monni awurade foforͻ biara wͻ N’akyi. Ampa, nyinasoͻ pefee fri mo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ aba mo hͻ; enti (sε morehyε adeε ama obi a) monhyε ma εnyε ma, na monsusu (biribiara nso pεpεεpε) na monhwε na moanfa nyansa kwan ante amanfoͻ nneεma so, afei εmma monni nsεmͻne wͻ asaase no so wͻ akyire yi a yatoto biribiara wͻ so pεpεεpε.
